text: Palak Muchhal is a singer from Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India. She and her younger brother Palaash Muchhal perform stage shows across India and abroad to raise funds for the poor children who need money for treatment of heart disease. India's life-saving child singer - BBC News rediff.com: Indore's Palak Muchal sings for a cause Until January 2013 money collected through her charity shows has helped to save lives of 556 children suffering from heart ailments. Muchhal has made her entry in both Guinness Book of World Records and Limca Book of World Records for great achievements in social work. Her work is also recognized by the Government of India and other public institutions through various awards and honors. Muchhal also gives her voice as a Bollywood playback singer. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Indian singers Category:Bollywood playback singers
title: Palak Muchhal
